A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was a fun\, solid story\, and I'm really glad I caught it in the movieplex.

I think the new cast of characters are fun\, have great potential for development\, and I'm looking forward to seeing how they carry the storyline on from the old guard.

Were there weak spots?  Of course.  There have been in every Star Wars story.  But overall\, this is a great movie--don't let the haters convince you otherwise.
